CHAT.comment: POTTAWATTAMIE COUNTY, IOWA, ET AL., Petitioners v. CURTIS W. MCGHEE, JR., ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF STEPHEN SANDERS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF NEAL K. KATYAL ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PAUL D. CLEMENT ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF STEPHEN SANDERS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:04 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
